price: Basi litakase jina la Mola wako Mlezi aliye Mkubwa.
footnotes: Tanguliza tasbihi kwa kumdhukuru Mola wako Mlezi aliye Mkubwa, kwa kumtakasa na kumshukuru kwa neema zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
